昢字的基本解释

昢
pò
〔昢昢〕日月初出不太明亮的样子。

昢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pò］
［《廣韻》普没切，入没，滂。］
日刚出而未大亮。

昢字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　昢； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页493第03
【廣韻】【集韻】?普沒切，音馞。日未明貌。【楚辭·九思】時昢昢兮旦旦。【註】日月始出，光明未盛爲昢也。　又【集韻】普罪切，音琣。義同。　又滂佩切，音配。【玉篇】向晴也。

昢字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
昢字的起名意思

日月初出不太明亮的样子。

Awkward
Basic explanation of words
Awkward
pò
[昢昢] The sun and the moon are not very bright at the beginning of the day.
Awkward
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pò］
["Guang Yun" is not cut, enters, and pensive. ]
The day has just come out and it hasn't been bright.
Awkward
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Department] 　昢; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 493 03
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Pu hasn't cut, the sound is bad. The day is unknown. [Songs of the Chu·Nine Thoughts] The time is different. [Note] The sun and the moon begin to appear, and the light is not flourishing.　[Jiyun] universal sin, sound 琣. The same meaning.　 Peaches again, voice dubbing. [Jade articles] Xiang Qing also.
